snp2.11:336:
336
"Nāhaṁ abhiṇhasaṁvāsā, avajānāmi paṇḍitaṁ;
Ukkādhāro manussānaṁ,
niccaṁ apacito mayā".
snp2.11:337:
337
"Pañca kāmaguṇe hitvā, piyarūpe manorame;
Saddhāya gharā nikkhamma,
dukkhassantakaro bhava.
snp2.11:338:
338
Mitte bhajassu kalyāṇe, pantañca sayanāsanaṁ;
Vivittaṁ appanigghosaṁ,
mattaññū hohi bhojane.
snp2.11:339:
339
Cīvare piṇḍapāte ca, paccaye sayanāsane;
Etesu taṇhaṁ mākāsi,
mā lokaṁ punarāgami.
snp2.11:340:
340
Saṁvuto pātimokkhasmiṁ, indriyesu ca pañcasu;
Sati kāyagatā tyatthu,
nibbidābahulo bhava.
snp2.11:341:
341
Nimittaṁ parivajjehi, subhaṁ rāgūpasañhitaṁ;
Asubhāya cittaṁ bhāvehi,
ekaggaṁ susamāhitaṁ.
snp2.11:342:
342
Animittañca bhāvehi, Mānānusayamujjaha;
Tato mānābhisamayā,
Upasanto carissatī"ti.
